_header: I may well sigh for grievous is my pain
_description: A Lover’s Plaint — three stanzas rhyme royal, last line ‘Alas for woo departynge hath me slayn’ of each repeated as refrain

CULFf16.First Lines:
I may well sygh for greuous ys my payneNow to departe fram yow thys
                    sodenly…
CULFf16.Last Lines:
…With alle my myght to bebothe true amp; playnAlas for woo
                    departynge hath me slayn
